templates.name: Apply CCKM to WLAN profile that has CAMPUS in the Profile Name
9800 AP-JOIN

templateParams.description:
Configures Hyperlocation/BLE/FastLocate features on all supported APs.
Modest client performance impact if not 4800/9120/9130.
Configure admin credentials on AP. Enables AP serial console access. Only enable for lab use or troubleshooting.

promotedTemplateParams.description:
Configures Hyperlocation/BLE/FastLocate features on all supported APs.
Modest client performance impact if not 4800/9120/9130.
Configure admin credentials on AP. Enables AP serial console access. Only enable for lab use or troubleshooting.

templates.name: C9800 INTERFACES
templates.templateContent:
{#
!! 20210615 JOGRIM
#}

{% if __device.platformId == "C9800-CL-K9" %}
  !
  interface GigabitEthernet2
    description WMI & CENTRALIZED WLANS
    switchport trunk allowed vlan 2-1000
    snmp trap link-status
  !
{% elif __device.platformId == "C9800-L-K9" %}
  !
  interface range TwoGigabitEthernet0/0/0-3
    shutdown
  !
  interface range TenGigabitEthernet0/1/0-1
    description WMI & CENTRALIZED WLANS
    switchport
    no shutdown
    snmp trap link-status
    channel-group 1 mode on
  !
  interface Port-Channel1
    description WMI & CENTRALIZED WLANS
    switchport
    switchport mode trunk
    switchport trunk allowed vlan 2-1000
    no shutdown
  !
{% endif %}

templates.name: 9800 HARDENING
templates.templateContent:
{#
!! 20210615 JOGRIM
#}

{# SET TIMEZONE & DST -#}
{% if __timezonesite[0] == "US/Eastern" %}
  clock timezone EST -5
  clock summer-time EDT recurring
{% elif __timezonesite[0] == "US/Central" %}
  clock timezone CST -6
  clock summer-time CDT recurring
{% elif __timezonesite[0] == "US/Mountain" %}
  clock timezone MST -7
  clock summer-time MDT recurring
{% elif __timezonesite[0] == "US/Pacific" %}
  clock timezone PST -8
  clock summer-time PDT recurring
{% else %}
  # TIMEZONE - NO MATCH - DEFAULT TO EASTERN
  clock timezone EST -5
  clock summer-time EDT recurring
{% endif %}

{# SET LOGIN BANNER -#}
<MLTCMD>banner login @
{{ __devicebanner[0].bannerMessage }}
@</MLTCMD>

{# SET COMMON CONFIG -#}
logging buffered 409600 debugging
!
archive
  log config
    logging enable
    notify syslog contenttype plaintext
!
service tcp-keepalives-in
service tcp-keepalives-out
service timestamps debug datetime msec
service timestamps log datetime msec
service password-encryption
!
no ip http server
ip http session-idle-timeout 600

{# ASSOCIATE HTTP AUTHENTICATION TO DNAC PROVISIONED LOGIN  #}
ip http authentication aaa login-authentication VTY_authen
ip http authentication aaa exec-authorization VTY_author

{# CONFIGURE ADDITIONAL VTYs FOR PROCESSING WEB GUI REQUESTS #}
line vty 0 97
  logging synchronous
  transport input ssh

{# SET C9800-L WEB GUI TRUSTPOINT -#}
{% if __device.platformId == "C9800-L-K9" %}
  no ip http secure-server
  ip http secure-trustpoint CISCO_IDEVID_SUDI
  ip http secure-server
{% endif %}
